Rose: Roses typically grow in gardens and should be watered every 2-3 days.
Sunflower: Sunflowers thrive in open fields and require watering every day.
Orchid: Orchids are often found in greenhouses and need watering every 5-7 days.
Lily: Lilies grow near pond edges and should be watered twice a week.
Tulip: Tulips are commonly found in flower beds and require watering every 3-4 days.
